item.title: The First 20 years of my life in a nutshell
item.author: ahmed@offsechq.com (A.Alghali)
item.description: Today I folded the first 21 years of my life, years I canâ€™t repeat or replay. I thank Allah for allowing me to live this long. Those first 21 years were upheavals.
